sentences.sContent: Jane gesticulated wildly and shouted ‘Stop! Stop!’
sentences.sCn: 简拼命打着手势，喊着“停下！停下！”

synos.tran: 用姿势示意；（讲话时）做手势

remMethod.val: 来自gesture(n. 手势， 姿势)

trans.tranOther: to make movements with your arms and hands, usually while speaking, because you are excited, angry, or cannot think of the right words to use
